segments.text: So you've been attending night classes for a while now . Do you feel it's helping you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , furthering my education is already bringing about positive results in my workplace as it has boosted my confidence.As well the tutoring system my school employs offers courses uniquely suite
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? That's great that you found a school that puts your need first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As well my company has been very supportive about my decision.They ' Ve cut back my working hours in order to accommodate my studies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are.We definitely see eye-to eye on my enhanced performance being a win-win situation for everyone involved .
